00012 ORRunContext::ORRunContext(ORHeader* header, const char* runCtrlPath)
00013 {
00014   fHeader = NULL;
00015   fClassName = "";
00016   fRunNumber = 0;
00017   fIsQuickStartRun = false;
00018   fIsRecordSwapped = false;
00019   fRunType = 0;
00020   fStartTime = 0;
00021   fState = kIdle;
00022   if (header != NULL) LoadHeader(header, runCtrlPath);
00023   fHardwareDict = NULL;
00024   fWritableSocket = NULL;
00025 }

00027 ORRunContext::~ORRunContext()
00028 {
00029   if (fHardwareDict) delete fHardwareDict;
00030 }
00031 
00032 bool ORRunContext::LoadHeader(ORHeader* header, bool ignoreRunControl, const char* runCtrlPath)
00033 {
00034 
00035   fClassName = "";
00036   fRunNumber = -1;
00037   fRunType = -1;
00038   fStartTime = -1;
00039   fIsQuickStartRun = false;
00040   if (!header) {
00041     ORLog(kError) << "Header is NULL!" << std::endl;
00042     return false;
00043   }
00044   fHeader = header;
00045   if (ignoreRunControl) return true;
00046   if (fHardwareDict) delete fHardwareDict;
00047   fHardwareDict = new ORHardwareDictionary();
00048   if(!fHardwareDict->LoadHardwareDictFromDict(fHeader->GetDictionary())) {
00049     ORLog(kWarning) << "Error loading hardware dictionary!" << std::endl;
00050     delete fHardwareDict;
00051     fHardwareDict = NULL;
00052   }
00053   ORDictValueA* dataChain = (ORDictValueA*) header->LookUp(runCtrlPath);
00054   ORDictionary* runCtrlDict = 0;
00055   if (dataChain) { 
00056     for (size_t i=0; i< dataChain->GetNValues();i++) {
00057       runCtrlDict = (ORDictionary*)((ORDictionary*)dataChain->At(i))->LookUp("Run Control");
00058       if (runCtrlDict) break;
00059     }
00060   } else {
00061     ORLog(kWarning) << "You are using older version Orca file.  Please update Orca as future support will not be guaranteed." << endl; 
00062     runCtrlDict = (ORDictionary*) header->LookUp("Run Control");
00063   }
00064   if(!runCtrlDict) {
00065     ORLog(kError) << runCtrlPath << " not found!" << endl;
00066     return false;
00067   }
00068   if (ORLogger::GetSeverity() <= ORLogger::kDebug && fHardwareDict) {
00069     ORXmlPlistString xmlString;
00070     xmlString.LoadDictionary(fHardwareDict);
00071     ORLog(kDebug) << std::endl << xmlString << std::endl;
00072   }
00073   fClassName = ((ORDictValueS*) runCtrlDict->LookUp("Class Name"))->GetS();
00074   fRunNumber = ((ORDictValueI*) runCtrlDict->LookUp("RunNumber"))->GetI();
00075   fIsQuickStartRun = ((ORDictValueB*) runCtrlDict->LookUp("quickStart"))->GetB();
00076   fRunType = ((ORDictValueI*) runCtrlDict->LookUp("runType"))->GetI();
00077   fStartTime = ((ORDictValueI*) runCtrlDict->LookUp("startTime"))->GetI();
00078   return true;
00079 }
00080 
00081 void ORRunContext::LoadRunStartRecord(UInt_t* record)
00082 {
00083   ORRunDecoder runDecoder;
00084   fRunNumber = runDecoder.RunNumberOf(record);
00085   fIsQuickStartRun = runDecoder.IsQuickStartRun(record);
00086   //fRunType = ?? FIXME
00087   fStartTime = runDecoder.UtimeOf(record);
00088 }
00089 
00090 void ORRunContext::SetIdle()
00091 { 
00092   if(fState == kRunning) {
00093     ORLog(kWarning) << "Never got a run-stop packet..." << endl;
00094   } else if(fState != kStopping) {
00095     ORLog(kError) << "Switching to idle from non-stopping state " 
00096                   << fState << endl;
00097   } 
00098   fState = kIdle; 
00099 } 
00100 
00101 void ORRunContext::SetStarting()
00102 { 
00103   if(fState != kIdle) {
00104     ORLog(kError) << "Starting from non-idle state " << fState << endl;
00105   } 
00106   fState = kStarting; 
00107 } 
00108 
00109 void ORRunContext::SetRunning() 
00110 { 
00111   if(fState == kIdle) {
00112     ORLog(kWarning) << "Never got a run-start packet..." << endl;
00113   } else if(fState != kStarting) {
00114     ORLog(kError) << "Switching to running state from non-starting state " 
00115                   << fState << endl;
00116   }
00117   fState = kRunning; 
00118 }
00119 
00120 void ORRunContext::SetStopping()
00121 { 
00122   if(fState != kRunning) {
00123     ORLog(kError) << "Stopping from non-idle state " << fState << endl;
00124   } 
00125   fState = kStopping; 
00126 }

00128 Int_t ORRunContext::WriteBackToSocket(const void* buffer, size_t nBytes)
00129 {
00130   if(!fWritableSocket) return 0;
00131   return fWritableSocket->WriteBuffer(buffer, nBytes);
00132 }
